revised_title: Julius Vitalis' Epitaph and the History of the Twentieth Legion
tldr: This article presents an account of an ancient inscription discovered near Bath, which relates to Julius Vitalis, a member of the Twentieth Legion. The author provides a translation and analysis of the inscription, discussing its historical context and the role of the legion in Britain. The article also includes a commentary on the inscription by Henry Dodwell and a discussion of the legion's history and significance.
